data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Pärnu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pärnu, Estonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 45,110 who are far from you in Pärnu, Estonia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Pärnu, Estonia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Pärnu.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Pärnu, Estonia honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Pärnu, Estonia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Pärnu, Estonia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Pärnu, Estonia has a population of 85,800.

We estimate Pärnu has 4,025 people who might know Jesus, 36,665 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 45,110 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Pärnu to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
